en.title: What Is the Kitten Socialization Period? Understanding the Critical Weeks 2-7
en.content:
The kitten socialization period occurs between approximately 2 and 7 weeks of age, and experiences during this time greatly influence the cat's adult personality.

Why Is the Socialization Period So Important?

During this period, the brain develops rapidly, and curiosity outweighs fear when encountering new stimuli. Through exposure to people, other animals, and everyday sounds, kittens learn to recognize these as "safe."

Experiences Kittens Should Have During Socialization

Interaction with various people (men, women, children, elderly individuals), exposure to household sounds (vacuum cleaners, TVs, doorbells), gentle handling (being held, brushing, nail trimming), and socializing with other animals.

The Breeder's Role

Since most of the socialization period is spent at the breeder's facility, the breeder's rearing approach is extremely important. At Fuluck Cattery, we thoroughly socialize kittens in a home environment, raising them to be friendly and calm.

zh.title: 什么是幼猫社会化期？解读最关键的出生后2-7周
zh.content:
幼猫的社会化期大约在出生后2至7周龄之间，这一时期的经历会极大地影响成年后的性格。

为什么社会化期如此重要？

在这个时期，大脑发育迅速，面对新刺激时好奇心会超过恐惧感。通过接触人类、其他动物和日常生活中的声音，幼猫会将这些认知为"安全的事物"。

社会化期应该让幼猫体验的事情

与各种各样的人（男性、女性、儿童、老人）互动，接触生活中的声音（吸尘器、电视、门铃），温柔的抚触训练（抱、梳毛、剪指甲），以及与其他动物的交流。

繁育者的职责

由于社会化期的大部分时间是在繁育者身边度过的，繁育者的养育方式至关重要。福楽猫舍在家庭环境中彻底进行社会化训练，培养出亲人且温顺的幼猫。
